name: Polygoneer
description: POLYGONEER is an arcade reflex based game. You should defend yourself from polygonal enemies that come from all sides, hitting them with the right color shot, one miss and its the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP or later Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ or Better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHZ or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later Storage: 100 MB available space
